select ifnull(sum(flowTotal), 0) as wholeFlows from ( select sum(flowTotal) as flowTotal from ( select t1.src_ip as srcIp, t1.dst_ip as dstIp, sum(ifnull(flowIn, 0)+ifnull(flowOut, 0)) as flowTotal from ( select sum(octets_total) as flowIn, src_ip, dst_ip from ANA_IF_IN_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} where if_in_id in (${ifId}) and acq_time > ${stime} and acq_time <= ${etime} group by src_ip, dst_ip ) t1 left join ( select sum(octets_total) as flowOut, src_ip, dst_ip from ANA_IF_OUT_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} where if_out_id in (${ifId}) and acq_time > ${stime} and acq_time <= ${etime} group by src_ip, dst_ip ) t2 on t1.src_ip=t2.src_ip and t1.dst_ip = t2.dst_ip group by t1.src_ip, t1.dst_ip ) t12 group by t12.srcIp, t12.dstIp
union
select sum(flowTotal) as flowTotal from ( select t5.src_ip as srcIp, t5.dst_ip as dstIp, sum(ifnull(flowIn, 0)+ifnull(flowOut, 0)) as flowTotal from ( select sum(octets_total) as flowIn, src_ip, dst_ip from ANA_IF_IN_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} where if_in_id in (${ifId}) and acq_time > ${stime} and acq_time <= ${etime} group by src_ip, dst_ip ) t4 right join ( select sum(octets_total) as flowOut, src_ip, dst_ip from ANA_IF_OUT_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} where if_out_id in (${ifId}) and acq_time > ${stime} and acq_time <= ${etime} group by src_ip, dst_ip ) t5 on t4.src_ip=t5.src_ip and t4.dst_ip = t5.dst_ip group by t5.src_ip, t5.dst_ip ) t45 group by t45.srcIp, t45.dstIp ) t3

select ifnull(sum(flowTotal), 0) as wholeFlows, ifnull(sum(packetTotal), 0) as wholePackets, ifnull(sum(connectTotal), 0) as wholeConnects from ( select sum(flowTotal) as flowTotal, sum(packetTotal) as packetTotal, sum(connectTotal) as connectTotal from ( select t1.src_ip as srcIp, t1.dst_ip as dstIp, sum(ifnull(flowIn, 0)+ifnull(flowOut, 0)) as flowTotal, sum(ifnull(packetIn, 0)+ifnull(packetOut, 0)) as packetTotal, sum(ifnull(connectIn, 0)+ifnull(connectOut, 0)) as connectTotal from ( select src_ip, dst_ip, sum(octets_total) as flowIn, sum(packet_total) as packetIn, sum(flow_total) as connectIn from ANA_IF_IN_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} where if_in_id in (${ifId}) and acq_time > ${stime} and acq_time <= ${etime} group by src_ip, dst_ip ) t1 left join ( select src_ip, dst_ip, sum(octets_total) as flowOut, sum(packet_total) as packetOut, sum(flow_total) as connectOut from ANA_IF_OUT_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} where if_out_id in (${ifId}) and acq_time > ${stime} and acq_time <= ${etime} group by src_ip, dst_ip ) t2 on t1.src_ip=t2.src_ip and t1.dst_ip = t2.dst_ip group by t1.src_ip, t1.dst_ip ) t12 group by t12.srcIp, t12.dstIp
union
select sum(flowTotal) as flowTotal, sum(packetTotal) as packetTotal, sum(connectTotal) as connectTotal from ( select t5.src_ip as srcIp, t5.dst_ip as dstIp, sum(ifnull(flowIn, 0)+ifnull(flowOut, 0)) as flowTotal, sum(ifnull(packetIn, 0)+ifnull(packetOut, 0)) as packetTotal, sum(ifnull(connectIn, 0)+ifnull(connectOut, 0)) as connectTotal from ( select sum(octets_total) as flowIn, src_ip, dst_ip, sum(packet_total) as packetIn, sum(flow_total) as connectIn from ANA_IF_IN_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} where if_in_id in (${ifId}) and acq_time > ${stime} and acq_time <= ${etime} group by src_ip, dst_ip ) t4 right join ( select sum(octets_total) as flowOut, src_ip, dst_ip, sum(packet_total) as packetOut, sum(flow_total) as connectOut from ANA_IF_OUT_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} where if_out_id in (${ifId}) and acq_time > ${stime} and acq_time <= ${etime} group by src_ip, dst_ip ) t5 on t4.src_ip=t5.src_ip and t4.dst_ip = t5.dst_ip group by t5.src_ip, t5.dst_ip ) t45 group by t45.srcIp, t45.dstIp ) t3

select * from ( select t12.*, ifnull(t12.flowTotal, 0) / ${condition.wholeFlows} as flowPctge, ifnull(t12.packetTotal, 0) / ${condition.wholePackets} as packetPctge, ifnull(t12.connectNumberTotal, 0) / ${condition.wholeConnects} as connectPctge from ( select t1.src_ip as srcIp, t1.dst_ip as dstIp,
ifnull(flowIn, 0) as flowIn, ifnull(flowOut, 0) as flowOut, sum(ifnull(flowIn, 0)+ifnull(flowOut, 0)) as flowTotal, ifnull(flowIn, 0) / ${condition.timeInterval} as speedIn, ifnull(flowOut, 0) / ${condition.timeInterval} as speedOut, sum(ifnull(flowIn, 0)+ifnull(flowOut, 0))/${condition.timeInterval} as speedTotal,
ifnull(packetIn, 0) as packetIn, ifnull(packetOut, 0) as packetOut, sum(ifnull(packetIn, 0)+ifnull(packetOut, 0)) as packetTotal, ifnull(packetIn, 0) / ${condition.timeInterval} as packetInSpeed, ifnull(packetOut, 0) / ${condition.timeInterval} as packetOutSpeed, sum(ifnull(packetIn, 0)+ifnull(packetOut, 0))/${condition.timeInterval} as packetTotalSpeed,
ifnull(connectIn, 0) as connectNumberIn, ifnull(connectOut, 0) as connectNumberOut, sum(ifnull(connectIn, 0)+ifnull(connectOut, 0)) as connectNumberTotal, ifnull(connectIn, 0)/${condition.timeInterval} as connectNumberInSpeed, ifnull(connectOut, 0)/${condition.timeInterval} as connectNumberOutSpeed, sum(ifnull(connectIn, 0)+ifnull(connectOut, 0))/${condition.timeInterval} as connectNumberTotalSpeed from ( select sum(octets_total) as flowIn, sum(packet_total) as packetIn, sum(flow_total) as connectIn, src_ip, dst_ip from ANA_IF_IN_NET_APP_TOS_${condition.tableSuffix} where if_in_id in (${condition.ifId}) and acq_time > ${condition.stime} and acq_time <= ${condition.etime} group by src_ip, dst_ip ) t1 left join ( select sum(octets_total) as flowOut, sum(packet_total) as packetOut, sum(flow_total) as connectOut, src_ip, dst_ip from ANA_IF_OUT_NET_APP_TOS_${condition.tableSuffix} where if_out_id in (${condition.ifId}) and acq_time > ${condition.stime} and acq_time <= ${condition.etime} group by src_ip, dst_ip ) t2 on t1.src_ip=t2.src_ip and t1.dst_ip = t2.dst_ip group by t1.src_ip, t1.dst_ip ) t12 group by t12.srcIp, t12.dstIp
union
select t45.*, ifnull(t45.flowTotal, 0) / ${condition.wholeFlows} as flowPctge, ifnull(t45.packetTotal, 0) / ${condition.wholePackets} as packetPctge, ifnull(t45.connectNumberTotal, 0) / ${condition.wholeConnects} as connectPctge from ( select t5.src_ip as srcIp, t5.dst_ip as dstIp,
ifnull(flowIn, 0) as flowIn, ifnull(flowOut, 0) as flowOut, sum(ifnull(flowIn, 0)+ifnull(flowOut, 0)) as flowTotal, ifnull(flowIn, 0) / ${condition.timeInterval} as speedIn, ifnull(flowOut, 0) / ${condition.timeInterval} as speedOut, sum(ifnull(flowIn, 0)+ifnull(flowOut, 0))/${condition.timeInterval} as speedTotal,
ifnull(packetIn, 0) as packetIn, ifnull(packetOut, 0) as packetOut, sum(ifnull(packetIn, 0)+ifnull(packetOut, 0)) as packetTotal, ifnull(packetIn, 0) / ${condition.timeInterval} as packetInSpeed, ifnull(packetOut, 0) / ${condition.timeInterval} as packetOutSpeed, sum(ifnull(packetIn, 0)+ifnull(packetOut, 0))/${condition.timeInterval} as packetTotalSpeed,
ifnull(connectIn, 0) as connectNumberIn, ifnull(connectOut, 0) as connectNumberOut, sum(ifnull(connectIn, 0)+ifnull(connectOut, 0)) as connectNumberTotal, ifnull(connectIn, 0)/${condition.timeInterval} as connectNumberInSpeed, ifnull(connectOut, 0)/${condition.timeInterval} as connectNumberOutSpeed, sum(ifnull(connectIn, 0)+ifnull(connectOut, 0))/${condition.timeInterval} as connectNumberTotalSpeed
from ( select sum(octets_total) as flowIn, sum(packet_total) as packetIn, sum(flow_total) as connectIn, src_ip, dst_ip from ANA_IF_IN_NET_APP_TOS_${condition.tableSuffix} where if_in_id in (${condition.ifId}) and acq_time > ${condition.stime} and acq_time <= ${condition.etime} group by src_ip, dst_ip ) t4 right join ( select sum(octets_total) as flowOut, sum(packet_total) as packetOut, sum(flow_total) as connectOut, src_ip, dst_ip from ANA_IF_OUT_NET_APP_TOS_${condition.tableSuffix} where if_out_id in (${condition.ifId}) and acq_time > ${condition.stime} and acq_time <= ${condition.etime} group by src_ip, dst_ip ) t5 on t4.src_ip=t5.src_ip and t4.dst_ip = t5.dst_ip group by t5.src_ip, t5.dst_ip ) t45 group by t45.srcIp, t45.dstIp
) t3 group by srcIp, dstIp
order by t3.${condition.sort} ${condition.order}
